sunset.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the time of day when the sun disappears and night begins
sunset.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We take the flag down at sunset.
sunset.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the coloured part of the sky where the sun is disappearing at the end of the day
sunset.translation[1].definitions[0].def: no longer very profitable or important and based on old TECHNOLOGIES
sunset.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: As their profit levels fall, these new industries, in their turn, will become sunset sectors.
sunset.translation[1].definitions[1].def: sunset rules or laws are ones which cancel rules or laws that were made in the past
sunset.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The new sunset law will eliminate statutes that are more than 10 years old.
Thesunset provisions will cancel most tax increases since June 30.
